title: noOctalEscape
description: |
  Disallow octal escape sequences in string literals

:::caution

Sources: 
- Same as: <a href="https://eslint.org/docs/latest/rules/no-octal-escape" target="_blank"><code>no-octal-escape</code></a>

## Description
Disallow octal escape sequences in string literals

As of the ECMAScript 5 specification, octal escape sequences in string literals are deprecated and should not be used.
Unicode escape sequences should be used instead.

### Examples

### Invalid

```js
var foo = "Copyright \251";
```

<pre class="language-text"><code class="language-text">code-block.js:1:11 <a href="https://biomejs.dev/linter/rules/no-octal-escape">lint/nursery/noOctalEscape</a> ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━<br /><br />  <strong><span style="color: lightgreen;">ℹ</span></strong> <span style="color: lightgreen;">Don't use </span><span style="color: lightgreen;"><strong>octal</strong></span><br />  <br />  <strong><span style="color: Tomato;">&gt;</span></strong> <strong>1 │ </strong>var foo = &quot;Copyright &#92;251&quot;;<br />   <strong>   │ </strong>          <strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><strong><span style="color: Tomato;">^</span></strong><br />    <strong>2 │ </strong><br />  <br />  <strong><span style="color: lightgreen;">ℹ</span></strong> <span style="color: lightgreen;">Don't use octal escape sequences: &quot;Copyright &#92;251&quot;</span><br />  <br />  <strong><span style="color: lightgreen;">ℹ</span></strong> <span style="color: lightgreen;">Use unicode or hexidecimal escape sequences instead.</span><br />  <br /></code></pre>

### Valid

```js
var foo = "Copyright \u00A9";   // unicode

var foo = "Copyright \xA9";     // hexadecimal
```

## How to configure
```json title="biome.json"
{
	"linter": {
		"rules": {
			"nursery": {
				"noOctalEscape": "error"
			}
		}
	}
}

```
